author: MSNBC
title: New York man wins $10 million lottery prize — again
description: Three years after winning a $10 million lottery prize, a New York man has done it again. Juan Hernandez purchased a winning ticket for the same amount for the second time.
content:
Three years after winning a $10 million lottery prize, a New York man has done it again. 
Juan Hernandez, of Uniondale, New York, won New York Lotterys $10,000,000 Deluxe scratch-off game earlier th… [+691 chars]
